SEARCH
Module Game
Package Model

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
Model.Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public abstract class Piece extends Object
This is an abstract class for all chess pieces, it has all the attributes and movement methods each piece needs.

    • CheckExists

      protected boolean CheckExists(Grid grid, int currentX, int currentY, int targetX, int targetY)
      This method moves piece from current position to target position, then runs all possible moves, and checks whether the move is possible. Then it returns the piece to original place and returns a boolean value that says whether is possible or not.
      Returns:
      true if move possible, and false if not possible

    • checkForChecks

      protected void checkForChecks(Grid grid, ArrayList<Integer> possibleChecks)
